description.en: Let's see how fast your robot runs. Lay down your challenge field and drive your robot around the field as fast as possible. You might need to ask someone to help you with timing.
The robot cannot touch the challenge field at any point.

<20 seconds = Good job! Are you ready for another round?
<15 seconds = Wow! Excellent job! Do you think you can do it even faster?
<10 = Outstanding! You are such a pro! Well done!
Bonus task: Can you program your robot to drive around the Challenge Field?

Complete three trials and calculate your points:
<20 seconds = 5 points
<15 seconds = 10 points
<10 seconds = 15 points
We would love to see your scores. Please share your scores in our Community Forum by clicking on the following link:
